name: China Town Chicken Recipe | Gulzar Hussain | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for China Town Chicken Recipe: Chicken 1/2kg Finely Chopped Ginger Garlic 2 tbsp Illicium Verum 2 White Pepper Powder 1/2tsp Crushed Black Pepper 1tsp Soya Sauce ½ cup Brown Sugar 4tbsp Vinegar 2tbsp Honey 1tbsp Chinese Salt 1/3tsp Oil 1-2 tbsp Salt to taste
instructions: Take ½kg chicken in it add2tbsp finely chopped Garlic and ginger, water and 2 Illicium verum and boil it. Now in a mixing bowl put ½ tsp White pepper powder, 1tsp Crushed black pepper Add 1/2 cup soya sauce, 4tbsp brown sugar, 2tbsp vinegar, 1 tbsp honey Add 1/3 tsp Chinese salt, 1-2tbsp oil and salt to taste and mix it. Now add in chicken and cook till chicken is properly cooked and sauce becomes thyick.
